ComicInfo.Summary:
In the future, cars are cybernetic. A man falls in love with two cars and jealousy ensues.
A woman is in a psycho ward because she thinks Judge Dredd is going to come to arrest her for dropping jam and not cleaning it up.
Micky Swift is offered "the Job" by Sweeny.
